sinet.heading: SI-NET
sinet.Text:
Whether the URL to be scanned can be accessed from outside SI-NET.

  • Choose 'Internal' if the url can accessed from inside SI-NET only. Choosing this option will run the scan on an agent inside SI-NET.
  • Choose 'External' if the url can accessed from outside SI-NET too. Choosing this option will run the scan on any agent available.
